column4: Na nokwafo rugu wɔ adasamba mu."

column2: "Wɔnye hɔn mfɛfo keka nsɛngyangyan: Ano fenemfenem

column3: Gyirama a ɔka nsɛm akɛse no:"
Hɛn gyirama na yɛdze bedzi nyim; Yɛwɔ anowerba a ɔyɛ dzen: hɛn wura nye woana no a?"

column5: EWURADZE na ɔse; Medze hɔn besi nkwagye a wɔhaahaw ho no mu."

column2: "EWURADZE ne nsɛm yɛ nsɛm krɔnkrɔn; Dɛ dwetɛ a wɔanan no fononoo mu wɔ famu a

column4: ɔwo na ebɔbɔ hɛn ho ban
column5: Na akora hɛn efi mbasantsen yi mu daa."

column2: "Sɛ ehuhusɛm huhor wɔ adasamba mu a
